src:
Video de un perro y un gato que se unen para vencer a enorme rata
Un perro y un gato se alían para vencer a una rata que no se deja morder y salta sobre ellos
02 Nov 2019, 08:55 by Por  El Debate
Una enorme rata fue perseguida por un perro y un gato, que tuvieron que aliarse para intentar atrapar al roedor por su agilidad.
La agilidad de la rata y su valentía le valieron la vida, ya que con grandes saltos reta al perrito que está a punto de atraparla, y con su velocidad logró esquivar los ataques del felino que terminó brincando de miedo.





Video viral

text:
Video of a dog and a cat that come together to beat huge rat
A dog and a cat team up to beat a rat that does not bite and jumps on them
02 Nov 2019, 08:55 by By Debate
A huge rat was chased by a dog and a cat, who had to team up to try to catch the rodent for its agility.
The agility of the rat and his courage earned him life, since with great leaps he challenges the puppy that is about to catch it, and with his speed he managed to dodge the attacks of the feline that ended up jumping with fear.





Viral video
